reviews.content: Escherlol is the best owner! He is single-handedly hosting BB Network. The quality of the servers is great, and I would recommend this host.

reviews.content: Been working with for a very long time on the Era Nodes web application. The owner of EraNodes is a very kind and smart person. I am the lead web application developer of EraNodes. Very flexible to work with. You wouldn't regret his services and valuable connection.

reviews.author: GAMER HARSHIT RAJESH
reviews.content: The Best Host I have ever seen! 20 ms ping. Server literally doesn't lag, constant 20 tps. This host's 2 GB RAM seems to be 16 GB RAM of Aternos.

reviews.author: DarknessGaming
reviews.content: This is a top-notch host along with an excellent owner. His staff is extremely helpful and very responsive. Not to mention, they have amazing servers at a very reasonable price. I recommend this host to anyone with a medium budget as it is extremely affordable and worth it.
